name: Raymond J. SMOLSKY, and all Pennsylvania Prisoners v. PENNSYLVANIA GENERAL ASSEMBLY AND LEGISLATURES OF THE COMMONWEALTH OF PENNSYLVANIA, et al., and The State Department of Corrections of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Appellees
name_abbreviation: Smolsky v. Pennsylvania General Assembly & Legislatures

parties: Raymond J. SMOLSKY, and all Pennsylvania Prisoners v. PENNSYLVANIA GENERAL ASSEMBLY AND LEGISLATURES OF THE COMMONWEALTH OF PENNSYLVANIA, et al., and The State Department of Corrections of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 20th day of August, 2012, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
50 A.3d 1255
Raymond J. SMOLSKY, and all Pennsylvania Prisoners v. PENNSYLVANIA GENERAL ASSEMBLY AND LEGISLATURES OF THE COMMONWEALTH OF PENNSYLVANIA, et al., and The State Department of Corrections of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Appellees.

Aug. 20, 2012.
